definitions: To remove all coverings or clothes from someone or something.
To remove a layer from a surface.
To deprive someone of property, rights, or titles.
To remove components from a machine or device.
To tear or damage the thread of a screw or nut.
examples: They will strip the old paint from the door.
The thieves stripped the car of its tires.
He had to strip down to his underwear.
The company plans to strip the assets before selling.
Be careful not to strip the screw.
